description: A modern Cost Management web application built with Ruby on Rails. Easily track your expenses, manage categories, and stay on top of your financial goals. Features include user authentication, transaction history, and a responsive design for seamless use on any device.
A ruby on rails full stack project. It is a user-friendly rails blog app. Users can create new account, create posts, create comments and likes. Personalize their feeds with new stories daily

Aniverse is a sleek web application for anime enthusiasts. Discover a vast collection of anime titles, from popular to trending shows and access detailed information like synopses, genres, episode counts, and airing status. Explore genres, search with ease, and save favorite searches to your list.
Project-Anniverse is a web application built with JavaScript, designed for TV show enthusiasts. With this platform, users can discover, like, and comment on their favorite TV shows.

The Space Traveler site is a captivating web application offering an immersive experience for space enthusiasts. Discover information about rockets, dragons, and missions through a user-friendly interface.
A meticulously crafted dynamic website for anime enthusiasts. Featuring a visually appealing design, immersive anime exploration, and interactive card-based content.
A Todo List app created using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This app utilizes modern ES6 syntax and modular design, making it easy to organize and manage your tasks.
It's a fully functional online bookstore where bookworms can explore a wide range of titles, add books to their cart, and complete secure transactions.
The React Calculator is a web application with a user-friendly interface for mathematical calculations.
